original_title: Go Ahead, Grab Time By the Throat
overview: Abby got engaged and broken up with on the same day. And filmed all of it. Part documentary, part bizarre self-imposed Groundhog's Day, this "Docu-Fiction Inverted Rom-Com" blurs the line between fiction and reality and explores our need to cling onto those fleeting moments of loss and joy in our lives.
title: Go Ahead, Grab Time By the Throat
